#include<stdio.h>
long long int inline mini(long long a, long long b) {
    if(a < b) return a; return b;
    }
int main()
{
long long int pos,minimum,piles[100005],y,x=0,t,n,i;
scanf("%lld",&t);
while(t--)
{
    x=0;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&piles[i]);
        x=x^piles[i];
    }
    //printf("X %lld\n",x);
    if(x==0LL)
        printf("NO\n");
    else
    {
        minimum=1000000000000000001LL;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            y=x^piles[i];
            if(y<piles[i])
            {
                minimum = mini(minimum, piles[i] - y);
                pos     = i + 1;

            }
        }

    printf("YES %llu %llu\n",pos,minimum);
    }
}
return 0;
}
